text: Ani kahi ase aheta, jyanni ya hetune masjida banavili ki nukasana pohacavave ani inkarapurna gosti karavyata ani imanadharakammadhye phuta padavi, ani asa manasacya rahanyaci vyavastha karavi, jo yacya purvipasuna allaha ani tyacya paigambaraca virodhaka ahe, ani sapatha ghetila ki bhala'ikherija amaca konatahi hetu nahi ani allaha saksi ahe ki te purnatah khote aheta
